results.overview: Kurt Longson tries to avenge his daughters death. To succeed he has to battle with his conscience and morality to realize true love.

results.overview: Four women are waiting for the blue circle and a possible change of their lives.
results.title: Test

results.overview: On his journey towards becoming a film director, Cole discovers an insight that flips his perspective on his way of living.
results.title: Test

results.overview: San Francisco, 1985. Two opposites attract at a modern dance company. Together, their courage and resilience are tested as they navigate a world full of risks and promise, against the backdrop of a disease no one seems to know anything about.
results.title: Test

results.overview: Test is a multi-screen work using three animated sequences, a person, a teddy bear and the word TEST, whose synchronicity is continually being broken by the destruction of a tower block.
results.title: Test

results.overview: test footage collection from a 1984 independent film project
results.title: Test

results.overview: These experiments for Baes’s stop motion film ‘46 bis, rue de Belleville’ are an art work in its own right. The stop motion technique he uses belongs to the realm of animation. He never handles the camera in an obvious way, but shoots frame per frame in order to come up with a dreamlike staccato effect. With ‘Test’ Pascal Baes sets up his trademark: a low-tech edition of the time-lapse photography, applied to choreography.
results.title: Test

results.overview: The final chapter of Tales Of The Twisted, True And Macabre
results.title: Test

results.overview: God lives in Brussels. On Earth though, God is a coward, morally pathetic and odious to his family. His daughter, Ea, is bored at home and can't stand being locked up in a small apartment in ordinary Brussels, until the day she decides to revolt against her dad...
results.title: The Brand New Testament

results.overview: The worlds of three ordinary people converge during a historic cricket match, ultimately forcing them to make life-altering decisions.
results.title: Test

results.original_title: 新妹魔王の契約者 DEPARTURES
results.overview: The first movie based on the TV Series The Testament of Sister New Devil, takes place right after the season 2 final.
results.title: The Testament of Sister New Devil: Departures

results.overview: Annie lives in harmony with her husband Laurent and her children: the sensitive elders Maximilien and César; the younger Antoine whom Poupi, never-complaining teen, helps raising him. But a positive pregnancy test will disturb the harmony.
results.title: The Test

results.overview: Aglaé, a young factory worker, has only one focus in life: her job at a car crash test site. When she learns that the factory is going to be relocated abroad, she accepts, to everyone's surprise, to go to India in order to hold on to her job. Accompanied by two colleagues, she sets out on a perilous road trip to the other side of the world.
results.title: Crash Test Aglae

results.overview: Mizuki, a female doctor working at a certain hospital, is immersed in the treatment of Aimi, a high school girl infected with SDX (Viral and Sexually Sensitive Disease). During the treatment, Mizuki realizes that SDX is artificially made. However, at that moment, Dr. Nakamatsu appears and begins a desperate game of survival.
results.title: Strip Mahjong: Midnight Clinical Test

results.overview: In 1585 the Turks and Vallons are looting the Látrány region.
results.title: The Aga's Testament
